Combat Wizard Toka:
Hello! I'm Toka, Arbana's mentee!
Now I'm studying auxiliary magic that works in specific areas. I arrived here with Arbana as she is now in charge of the Training Zone.
Auxiliary magic I use, boosts offensive abilities. It does not apply to individual travelers, but to to the entire area.
Choose the auxiliary magic you need, and I will apply it to the entire area where you will train., It will take some time to cast magic that will affect the entire zone.
What type of offensive auxiliary magic are you interested in?
